channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge rejects Saudi Arabia's bid to dismiss 9/11 families lawsuit
item.description: Saudi Arabia can face a civil lawsuit that alleges the kingdom helped the 9/11 hijackers , a federal judge ruled Thursday. Why it matters: Those impac...

item.title: End of "de minimis" exemption means new tariffs on millions of packages
item.description: Tariffs on small packages from around the world went into effect early Friday morning, with the end of the " de minimis " exemption on postal shipment...

item.title: "Our hearts are broken": Parents of 2 children killed in shooting issue statements
item.description: The families of the two children killed in the Minneapolis school shooting issued their first statements on the tragedy on Thursday. The big picture: ...

item.title: RFK Jr. deputy Jim O'Neill chosen as acting CDC director
item.description: Jim O'Neill, the deputy secretary of Health and Human Services, has been picked to lead the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention as acting direc...

item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom said Trump’s law enforcement surge to Democratic-led cities is “blatant hypocrisy,” when, he says, there are higher crime...

item.title: Fed governor Lisa Cook sues Trump to block effort to remove her
item.description: Lisa Cook challenges President Donald Trump’s ability to firing her from the Federal Reserve, a case that has large implications for the future of the...

item.title: White House taps top RFK Jr. deputy as acting CDC director
item.description: The decision comes a day after Trump fired Susan Monarez, the Senate-confirmed CDC director, prompting a series of resignations of other top officials...

item.title: Utah to proceed with redrawing map that could help Dems, despite pressure from Trump
item.description: The Republican leaders of the state legislature expressed disagreement with the ruling but said they would nonetheless comply with it.

item.title: Trump floats unusual Republican National Convention before midterms
item.description: Democrats are also considering holding such a gathering before the November 2026 elections.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
